body_content.explanation: the edge of a cliff (= a high area of rock with a very steep side, often on a coast), where the ground falls very steeply down:
examples: Suddenly the back of the car was hanging over the cliff edge.

body_content.explanation: a point where a situation changes very suddenly and completely in a damaging way, or where something suddenly becomes much worse:
examples: Retirement doesn't have to be a cliff edge, where you go from full-time work to no work at all overnight.
The quality of service has gone over a cliff edge recently.
